text: @RNTata2000 Thank you sir @RNTata2000 for your generosity    When this @coronascare will over  if I survive after doing my physician’s greatest duty I will definitely buy @TataMotors car as mark of respect towards your great gesture towards India and celebrate our victory over Coronavirus...
